bioAsHtml: Saskia Vermeer is a senior software engineer and scrum master at Worth Internet Systems in The Hague, The Netherlands. She is an enthusiastic software developer with almost 20 years of technical experience. Saskia is also an active member of JDuchess, a global organization for women in Java technology. Through her board membership of Devoxx4Kids Netherlands she hopes to inspire young people with her enthusiasm for technology, so they might also consider a future in IT.

acceptedTalks.title: It started with a whiteboard in the kitchen - Experiences from an Agile Family

bio:
Saskia Vermeer is a senior software engineer and scrum master at Worth Internet Systems in The Hague, The Netherlands. She is an enthusiastic software developer with almost 20 years of technical experience. 
Saskia is also an active member of JDuchess, a global organization for women in Java technology. Through her board membership of Devoxx4Kids Netherlands she hopes to inspire young people with her enthusiasm for technology, so they might also consider a future in IT.
